Room.Name: Nissiau Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nissiau Lane, south of Roland's Royal Fighting Academy.
Room.LongDescription: Rowland's Royal Fighting Academy is one of the finest training facilities for great fighters aspiring to enter the service of Lyanden Castle. The Castle only accepts brave, strong and experienced fighters. On the south side of the road, you can see Dixon's Polearms, a small shop where large polearms are sold. Between Dixon's Polearms and Victory Travels, there is a small alley running towards the bay.
